modules.description: Handles audio format conversion with precise control over input and output parameters. Operates on audio frames and time bases, enabling low-level audio processing tasks. Used to initialize converters, retrieve time base information, and process audio data in real-time or flush buffers.

Provides functions for decoding and encoding video streams, manipulating audio samples, and extracting metadata from multimedia files. Works with data types such as video frames, audio buffers, and stream metadata. Used to process video files for format conversion and to analyze audio content for spectral analysis.

Converts audio formats with fine-grained control over input and output settings, processing audio frames and time bases for real-time or batch operations. Supports initializing converters, extracting time base metadata, and managing audio buffer flows. Key data types include audio frames, time bases, and conversion configurations. Examples include resampling audio streams, adjusting channel layouts, and synchronizing audio with video timestamps.
